title: Asobi ni Iku yo! - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Comedy   Ecchi   Fantasy   Harem   Mecha   Romance   School Life   Sci-fi   Seinen
tags: Adapted to Anime   Adapted to Manga   Aliens   Childhood Friends   Childhood Love   Harem-seeking Protagonist   Parody   Polygamy   Spies   Tsundere
author: Kamino Okina   神野 オキナ
description: Kakazu Kio, a senior high school student in Okinawa, Japan, woke up to find a strange girl beside him giving off the soft, steady sounds of a person sleeping. Moreover, there are cat ears and a tail growing out of her! In front of the bewildered Kio, his childhood friend appeared carrying breakfast. With a stern voice she asked, “Where is the pretty girl who returned with you yesterday? Introduce me!” Just as these two harsh sentences were about to turn into a full-blown pervert denunciation meeting, the beautiful by-the-books teacher, Itokazu Maki, burst in, making things even harder for Kio. However… this cat-ear girl who calls herself Eris is, in actual fact, an alien! But a mysterious group that refuses to accept this kind of alien contact as well as the CIA, not to mention the Japanese Intelligence Agency, are all reaching out their grubby hands towards the lighthearted Eris! “Stop it! What did Eris ever do to you?!”>
